gui

Class Events

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Events
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Events
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Creates the Events' controler of panels and dialogs.
